Augment.Name: Brightbane Emerald
Augment.Description: Command. This armor or shield always appears brilliant and gleaming, no matter what he conditions and despite all attempts to paint over or obscure it. Coveted by military leaders of all sorts, it carries a powerful aura that grants a +5 Insight bonus on Charisma-based skill checks. Command armor and command shields make their owners very noticeable, imposing a -6 penalty on Hide checks.

Augment.Name: Demonheart Emerald
Augment.Description: Demonic Shield. Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a shield of demonic energy will grant you a +30 Profane bonus to temporary hit points.

Augment.Name: Emerald of Arcane Empowerment
Augment.Description: Provides a +1 Enhancement bonus to bonus Imbue Dice.

Augment.Name: Emerald of Bitter Wounds
Augment.Description: Upgrades an item to provide a Greater Boon of Undeath. Every time a character wearing a Greater Boon of Undeath item is struck in combat, an Inflict Moderate Wounds spell will be cast on the character.

Augment.Name: Emerald of Eldritch Empowerment
Augment.Description: Provides a +1 Enhancement bonus to bonus Imbue Dice.

Augment.Name: Emerald of Greater Rage
Augment.Description: Upgrade an item to grant +3 Rage Charges.

Augment.Name: Emerald of Greater Smiting
Augment.Description: Upgrade an item to grant +3 Smite Evil charges.

Augment.Name: Emerald of Vile Empowerment
Augment.Description: Provides a +1 Enhancement bonus to bonus Imbue Dice.

Command armor and command shields make their owners very noticeable, imposing a -6 penalty on Hide checks.

Augment.Name: Legendary Demonheart Emerald
Augment.Description: Improved Demonic Shield. Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a shield of demonic energy will grant you a +120 Profane bonus to temporary hit points.

Augment.Name: Legendary Wraithborn Emerald
Augment.Description: Ghostly. Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee and missile attacks do not roll a miss chance or incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss due to incorporeality. Hide and Move Silently skills receive a +5 enhancement bonus.

Augment.Name: Wraithborn Emerald
Augment.Description: Ethereal: Equipping this item causes your hands and weapons to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets.
